parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unwanted activation of the ABS can cause increased stopping distances, leading to potential accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: The ABS engages unnecessarily
causing the vehicle to take longer than expected to come to a stop
and potentially leading to near-accidents or accidents.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake system can cause loss of control, leading to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: The brake pedal goes to the floor
the vehicle takes longer than expected to stop
the rear brakes become inoperative
and the front tires wear out unevenly.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Premature brake wear can lead to reduced stopping power, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The brake pads wear down excessively
scoring the rotors and requiring premature replacement.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the Body Control Module can cause various electrical systems to malfunction, including windows, door locks, radio, and windshield wipers, leading to inconvenience and potential safety risks.
symptoms: Windows
door locks
radio
and windshield wipers stop working or malfunction.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Electrical System Failure (Battery Cables and Terminals)
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Loose or faulty battery cables and terminals can cause the vehicle to lose power, stall, or even catch fire, leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: Vehicle loses power
stalls
or catches fire; battery acid leaks onto engine or surrounding components; battery cables or terminals loosen or disconnect.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Vehicle Fire (Possible Electrical or Mechanical Defect)
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A vehicle fire can cause damage, injury, or even fatalities.
symptoms: Vehicle catches fire
often preceded by loss of power or other electrical issues.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering column shifter can cause the vehicle to become stuck in gear, making it difficult or impossible to drive, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The steering column shifter breaks or becomes stuck
the vehicle is unable to shift into gear
the steering column needs to be replaced.
